name: Veggie Tales 3D
description:
Small, irate vegetable RPG.

Made in Adventure Game Studio over a few days using the pat'd draw-on-both-sides-of-a-piece-of-paper method. Released January 2010. Circa 2022, seems to perform best when windowed and in compatability mode for Windows XP. Windowed mode can be set using winsetup.exe.

CONTROLS:

arrows - walk

z - interact

x - inventory esc - menu

music: 'eritmix sux my dix' by computer truck, on freemusic.org.
